ValidationRule.description: When a 'Unit' has no NBV or $0 NBV, warn the user to enter NBV Overrride.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Username <>'rgali@blackdiamondgroup.com', OR( Unit_Text__c = "Duplicate", Product_Code__c = "UNIT", Product_Code__c = "UNIT-COMPLEX", Product_Code__c = "UNIT-A", Product_Code__c = "UNIT-B", Product_Code__c = "UNIT-C"), NOT( Unit_Text__c = "New Unit" ), OR( ISBLANK( NBV__c ), NBV__c = 0 ), Trans_Category__c = "Sale" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more units has no 'NBV'. Open the quote line drawer for each 'Unit' to set the 'NBV Override'.
